resources.string:
PM 2.9 - Changes:

• Bug Fixes. 


PM 2.8 - Changes:

• Home Page Icons Working. 
 • Home Health Page Included. 
 • Doctors will get Notification on Users Appointment. 
 • Search Doctors by Category. 
 • Icons Updated. 


PM 2.7 - Changes:

• Health Tips Working. 
 • Chat Implemented. with Image Support. 
 • Some Blood Banks Details Added. 


PM 2.6 - Changes:

• Patients will get Notification if Doctor Approve his Appointment. 
 • Patients can see His Notification History. 
 • Lets Go Button working in Home Page. 


PM 2.5 - Changes:

• Minor Changes in Database. 
 • Bug Fixes and Improvements. 


PM 2.4 - Changes:

• Some Major UI Changes here and There. 
 • layout Fixes for Small Screen devices. 
 • Bug Fixes and Improvements 


PM 2.3 - Changes:

• Colored UI. 
 • Patient History (For Doctors). 
 • Doctors can Approve Appointments. 
 • All Existing Appointments are Deleted for Altering in Database Structure. 


PM 2.2 - Changes:

• Separated views or Layout for Doctors and Patients. 
 • All Existing users makes as PATIENTS. 
 • SignUp as Doctor. 
 • App Logo Changed. 
 • login and Sign up Background Changed. 
 • New doctors can view their appointments. 
 • Doctors Profile page Changed ( Check timing TextView ). 
 • All New Doctors will immediately place in Doctors list for patients. 
 • When opening the app, after show a Toast "Welcome", then you can Open Navigation Drawer. 


Note : May be Unstable. Post reports with proper Details. Please. 


PM 2.1 - Changes:
 • New Tabs Added. 
 • Blood Bank working with Requests. 
 • Pathological Labs Implemented. 


PM 2.0 - Changes:
 • About us & Privacy Policy page Completed 
 • OTA update Enabled 


PM 1.9 - Changes:
 • Settings Tab will check for Updates and Changelog will Show There 
 • Login User image will show in Navigation Drawer Header 
 • Doctor Images Redesigned 
 • Sign up, Login, ForgetPassword pages Should Works As Should be. [ There are Some Code Glitches ] 
 • User Name will show in Navigation Drawer. 
 

PM 1.8 - Changes:
 • App size reduce from 12 MB to 5 MB.
 • All & and Images Stored in Server 
 • Forget Password Implemented.
 

PM 1.7 - Changes:
 • Redesign Appointment Layout & Appointment can be deleted [ On Tap ] 

 • Some Icon changed

PM 1.5 - Changes:
 • Make Appointment is Working. 
 \ **go to Patient Management. then select Your Appointment 
 

PM 1.2 - Changes:
 • New Personal Info Tab added. 


PM 1.1 - Changes:
 • Login & Sign up page Completed. 
 • Layout fix for small screen device(Sudipto) 
 • Logout button working. 
 • User Name will show in Navigation Drawer. 
 
 PM 1.0 - Changes:

• A Static login page is created (not connected to any database) 
 • Login id= admin & pass=admin 
 • Sign up page has been added. but its just a template. nothing to work. and *May be Crash your application* 
 • App Logo is Created.

We may collect information from you under the following circumstances.
 

\ \ • If you fill out and submit a form on the website.
 \ \ • If you access password restricted access areas of the website. Users may be identified by their login credentials. This information will only be used to direct users to the correct area of the website and to improve site content and usability.
 \ \ • If you voluntarily provide information to us through email correspondence or by phone.

We do not share personal information with third parties nor do we store any information about your visit to this website other than to analyse and optimise our content through the use of cookies.\n \n You can turn off the use of cookies at anytime by changing your specific browser settings

We may change this privacy policy at any time. Whenever we revise this privacy policy, we will change the date on the notice to indicate when revisions were made. By using our website and/or submitting personal information to us, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy as stated at the time you use the website and/or at the time you submit your personal information

We, at Patient Management Healthcare, are committed to protecting your privacy. \n\n This privacy policy gives you information as to the types of personal information we collect, how we use that information and whom we may share it with.
